definition[0]: between two places, and the same distance from each of them
example[0]: The city is midway between Edinburgh and London.
definition[1]: when half a period of time has passed
example[1]: Leeds scored midway through the first half.
definition[2]: two small islands in the Pacific Ocean northwest of Honolulu, used as a US military base. There was an important sea and air battle there in 1942 called the Battle of Midway.
definition[3]: an airport in Chicago, Illinois, used mostly for flights within the US
